titles.title: Sand Acquisition, Nourishment, and Development Act
A bill to amend the Water Resources Development Act of 1986 to modify a provision relating to acquisition of beach fill.
Sand Acquisition, Nourishment, and Development Act
SAND Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Sand Acquisition, Nourishment, and Development Act or the SAND Act
This bill allows the Department of the Army to acquire fill material for beach erosion and nourishment purposes from non-domestic sources even if such materials are available from domestic sources.
